Name: 巫族 WITCH RACE Prologue
About the game: 'Witch Race' is a lightweight Rogue Auto Chess game, which tells the dark era of the Fantasy World Isefa continent. Strategic formation of army, unlock heroes, make good use of arms and powerful combination skills. Witness the final fate of Witch Race and understand the truth behind the story. / Thrilling Storyline: Since after the great war,Lord of Miracles Amy Tio has been ruling the wizards. However, the birth of the Daughter of Prophecy has broken the long-lasting peace of Isefaia. Now everything's changed, the sealed awakened,the daughter of Witch Queen returned, multiple forces rose, all these signs are foreshadowing another great war...... The unpredictable battlefield: upgrade heroes, strengthen the army, constantly unlock new arms in the process, choose to create unique and powerful skill combinations, and each battle has a new experience. [*Hand-painted dark fantasy world.[/list]Save inheritance.
